description:
Don’t be a yo-yo.  Be the master of your own YO.

YO!+ is unlike any other App that you've ever seen. Those other humor Apps are all so last century.   YO! is interactive, YO! is informative, and YO! is fun(ny). Oh yeah, fun; how fun? Get this, YO!+ comes with an Exhibition mode that could leave you sleepless at night! That's right. Just spin up YO!+ and you'll be glued to your device's screen all night long.  Good-bye restful bliss; hello slinging some string whenever and wherever you want while reading one of the best yo-yo texts ever squeezed into a webOS App.

Right from the opening screen, you'll know this ain't your grandma's App. Touch any of six categories and you'll be whisked to a Yo classroom where you'll learn about the science of ups and downs. Inside YO!+:

Science – learn what makes a yo-yo go, well, up & down
YO! - enter the hallowed halls of yo-yo history
Shop – looking for a yo-yo; start here
Fun – give yourself a giggle, go ahead, you deserve it
Teach – discover 10 different yo-yo tricks and stunts
One YO Thing – ah, this is the BIG one, Exhibition mode

Oh, and why the “+” in YO!+? Because this App is made exclusively for the HP TouchPad. No other tablet has it and no other tablet is going to get it. Get it?

Now it’s YO! time!
